de.polygonal.ds.mem.FloatMemory

type
class
extends
MemoryAccess

A chunk of "alchemy memory" for storing IEEE 754 single-precision floating point numbers.

Static Methods

ofArray(input : Array<Float>, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : FloatMemory

parameters
min index pointing to the first float.
max index pointing to the last float.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a FloatMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input values are copied.

ofByteArray(input : flash.utils.ByteArray, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : FloatMemory

parameters
min index pointing to the byte storing the first float.
min index pointing to the byte storing the last float.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a FloatMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

ofBytesData(input : haxe.io.BytesData, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : FloatMemory

parameters
min index pointing to the byte storing the first float.
min index pointing to the byte storing the last float.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a FloatMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

ofVector(input : flash.Vector<Float>, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : FloatMemory

parameters
min index pointing to the first float.
max index pointing to the last float.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a FloatMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input values are copied.

toArray(input : FloatMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : Array<Float>

parameters
min index pointing to the first float.
max index pointing to the last float.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to an array.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

toByteArray(input : FloatMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : flash.utils.ByteArray

parameters
min index pointing to the first float.
max index pointing to the last float.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a byte array.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.
The bytes are written in little endian format.

toBytesData(input : FloatMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : haxe.io.BytesData

parameters
min index pointing to the first float.
max index pointing to the last float.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a BytesData object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

toVector(input : FloatMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int, ?output : flash.Vector<Float>) : flash.Vector<Float>

parameters
min index pointing to the first float.
max index pointing to the last float.
output the Vector object to write into. If null, a new Vector object is created on-the-fly.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a vector object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

Constructor

new(size : Int, ?name : String)

Creates a byte array capable of storing a total of size floats.

This value should never be changed by the user.

inline get(i : Int) : Float

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).

Returns the float at index i.

inline getAddr(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Returns the memory byte offset of the first byte storing the float at index i.

resize(newSize : Int) : Void

overrides
de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError invalid size (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory was already deallocated (debug only).
Adjusts the size of this object so it's capable of storing newSize floats.

inline set(i : Int, x : Float) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory deallocated (debug only).
Replaces the float at the index i with the float x.

inline swp(i : Int, j : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError index out of range (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError memory was deallocated (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertError i equals j (debug only).
Swaps the float at index i with the float at index j.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.
Prints out all elements if compiled with the -debug directive.
Example:
	  var mem = new new de.polygonal.ds.mem.FloatMemory(4);
	  for (i in 0...4) {
	      mem.set(i, i);
	  }
	  trace(mem);
	  {FloatMemory, size: 4}
	  |<
	    0 -> 0.000
	    1 -> 1.000
	    2 -> 2.000
	    3 -> 3.000
	  >|
